name: Super Tanks Blitz: World of battles
name_original: Super Tanks Blitz: World of battles
description:
Super Tanks Blitz is a genre mix of military strategy game, action shooting game, simulation game, and war game of fairly complex gameplay. World's most powerful and deadly tanks are under your fingertips. Destroy all enemy assets while you find your way through the heavily guarded enemy camps.
A first time experience of an action packed Tank battle mission defending your nation wall for the sake of your dignity of nation.

Your mission is to reach at specific destination by destroying all valuable enemy assets including tanks coming on the way. Survive yourself the tough deadly tanks war. Challenge your strategy thinking, tank aiming, shooting, and dodging skills. When the going gets tough, use the best artillery simulation tactics.
Control:

- Touch and drag finger any where on the screen for tank movement and rotation in any direction.
- Tank Rocket/Missile fire will destroy all enemy targets with a single direct hit
